title: Ratatouille 2007 3D 1080p BluRay Half SBS DTS x264 HDA DUAL-ASM
description:
In the new animated adventure Ratatouille, a rat named Remy dreams of becoming a great French chef despite his family's wishes and the obvious problem of being a rat in a decidedly rodent-phobic profession. When fate leads to the sewers of Paris, he finds himself ideally Remy situated beneath a restaurant made famous by his culinary hero, Auguste Gusteau. Despite the apparent dangers of being an inappropriate - and certainly unwanted - visitor in the kitchen of a fine French restaurant, Remy's passion for cooking soon sets into motion a hilarious and exciting rat race that turns the culinary world of Paris . Remy finds himself torn between his calling and the obligation of returning forever to his previous existence as a rat. He learns the truth about friendship, family and understands that his only option is to accept who he really is, a rat who wants to be a chef.
